trans-unit.source: Represents a hierarchical collection that can be enumerated with an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma colecção hierárquica que pode ser enumerada com um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>interface.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Collections that implement the IHierarchicalEnumerable interface are used by ASP.NET site navigation and data source controls.
trans-unit.target: Coleções que implementem a interface IHierarchicalEnumerable são utilizadas pela navegação de site do ASP.NET e controlos de origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: The IHierarchicalEnumerable interface extends the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface and exposes <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData%2A>, which is a method used to retrieve an <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData> object from an enumerated item, in addition to the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A interface IHierarchicalEnumerable expande o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>interface e expõe <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData%2A>, que é um método utilizado para obter um <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData>objeto a partir de um item enumerado, para além de <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>método.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Typically, clients that use IHierarchicalEnumerable collections retrieve an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object by calling the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> method, then iterate through the enumeration and call the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData%2A> on each enumerated item to retrieve an <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData> object.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, os clientes que utilizam IHierarchicalEnumerable coleções obter um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>objeto ao chamar o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>método, em seguida, itere através da enumeração e a chamada a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData%2A>em cada item enumerado para obter um <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Returns a hierarchical data item for the specified enumerated item.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um item de dados hierárquica para o item especificado enumerado.

trans-unit.source: Typically, clients that use <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable> collections retrieve an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object by calling the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> method, then iterate through the enumeration and call the GetHierarchyData method on each enumerated item to retrieve an <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData> object.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, os clientes que utilizam <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>coleções obter um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>objeto ao chamar o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>método, em seguida, itere através da enumeração e chame o método GetHierarchyData em cada item enumerado para obter um <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> for which to return an <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>para o qual devolver um <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData"></xref> instance that represents the <xref:System.Object> passed to the GetHierarchyData method.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData"> </xref> instância que representa o <xref:System.Object>transmitido ao método GetHierarchyData.</xref:System.Object>
